short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search classes you enrolled or teach in Google Classroom.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Helps you save time by filtering out classes that don't match what you've typed in the search bar. Matches with class name and teacher name.

Version 4.x 💀 Functionality
- 🔍 Limit search to class name or teacher name
- 🏷️ Set Aliases on classrooms for yourself (Ideas: Initials for quick searching, Rename unhelpful class names)
- [Firefox 🦊] Now able to give permission from extension icon popup

Searching with teacher name is not supported if the user is a teacher.

This extension does not collect nor transmit personal information. Searching options and aliases are stored locally.

🚀📚💡 Streamline your Google Classroom – install now!

⚠️ This is not an official product from Google or Google Classroom. ⚠️

Made by: Wuttiphat Kiddee

Version 4.2 Fixes and Changes
- [Feature] Edit alias as JSON object
- Enabled keyboard navigation outline
- Reduction in local storage usage up to 50%
- Improved Slash to Search (Firefox Find Override)
- Search bar now focused by default
- Minor Code Optimizations
